DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the validity of a screening tool which has been designed to detect the presence or absence of lower urinary tract symptoms in the general female population.
DOC.brief_title: Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Screening Questionnaire
DOC.criteria: Healthy participants, 18 years of age and older with any gynecological symptoms Patients with lower urinary tract symptoms and pelvic floor dysfunction
